A

creates the about dialog

randomly attacks a square for ai players

randomly places the ship for ai players
attack(int, int) - Method in class battleship.model.Game
uses the turn variable to determine who is attacking and performs an attack
attack(int, int) - Method in class battleship.model.Ship
check if the ship exists at the location, updates values if hit
